name: Pwong
description:
A remake of the classic game pong. Includes single-player and local multiplayer game modes. 

Beat your high score by yourself, or beat your friends in multiplayer!

CONTROLS:

  • R to restart
  • Escape to return to menu

Single-player:

  • Use arrow keys, W+S, or mouse to control paddles.

Multi-player:

  • Left/blue player use W+S.
  • Right/red player use up and down arrows.
